body:
Hi Dwayne,

I'm not really an expert since I started using these tools just few weeks ago, but I think that if you run just daylighting analysis using Radiance as a software engine you have no problems in adding this "isolated" objects. You just have to assign them a radiance material using a 'Honeybee_createHBSrfs' panel and then plugging them into the "_HBObjects" input of the "Honeybee_Run Daylight Simulation" panel. Radiance should not care about zones, if they're opened or closed etc.. Regards,
Claudio
